casebody.data:
No. 32,

Misc.

Arnold v. Ben Kanowsky, Inc. Arthur J. Riggs and Charles R. Cravens, Jr. for petitioner. G. H. Kelsoe, Jr. for respondent. Solicitor General Rankin, Stuart Rothman, Bessie Margolin and Sylvia S. Ellison for the Secretary of Labor, as amicus curiae, in support of the petition.

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis'and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit granted.
